title: I got a leaver after having to restart my computer twice because of league's issues
body: So today I was play a league game as I often do and a problem that has happened to me 2-3 times before (only being able to ping and move: no ability or backing) forced me to restart my computer. Later that game the game crashed and I got a bugsplat. Now why do I have a leaver for trying to play the game? So in the end I guess I only restarted my computer twice but still if there's any feed back out there please send it my way... I'm not so much angry as annoyed so there, have a nice day...

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be having a combinations of issues here and that really sucks.  :/  Bugsplats usually happen when a hardware, driver, or asset problem fails to render the game.  You'll want to run through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot this.

What I'm a bit unsure about, though, is your computer restarting.  Without too much context on that, I recommend double checking your air vents to make sure nothing is causing it to overheat.  Stick to custom games for now to troubleshoot, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if your pc is still needing to restart.

I used the reset button on the side of my computer to fix the only could ping problem cause after I closed the window I could still hear the sounds and the league client did not recognize that it was closed. Thank you for your help though.
